Q_DESC:
To wrtie a program in which the user inputs the number of elements as well the elements into a singly linked list. Now the user has to input the data of two nodes inthe linked list and swap both the nodes along with the data.
INPUT:
4 //size 
1 2 3 4 //elements
2  //node A
3 //node B
OUTPUT:

Linked list before swaping the nodes : 4 3 2 1 
Linked list after swaping the nodes : 4 2 3 1
TESTCASE_1:
4 1 2 3 4 2 3
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Linked list before swaping the nodes : 4 3 2 1 
Linked list after swaping the nodes : 4 2 3 1
TESTCASE_2:
7 11 22 33 44 55 66 77 33 66
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Linked list before swaping the nodes : 77 66 55 44 33 22 11 
Linked list after swaping the nodes : 77 33 55 44 66 22 11
TESTCASE_3:
10 99 67 54 673 354 67 54 87 24 59 59 99
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Linked list before swaping the nodes : 59 24 87 54 67 354 673 54 67 99 
Linked list after swaping the nodes : 99 24 87 54 67 354 673 54 67 59
